option.name: plugins
option._long: Loads the specified plugins, space-separated list.
option.default: alpha animate autostart command cube decoration expo fast-switcher fisheye grid idle invert move oswitch place resize switcher vswitch window-rules wobbly wrot zoom

option.name: plugins_nogl
option._long: Loads the specified plugins, space-separated list.
option.default: alpha animate autostart command decoration expo fast-switcher grid idle move oswitch place resize switcher vswitch window-rules wrot

option.name: close_top_view
option._long: Closes the currently focused window with the specified key.

option.name: vwidth
option._long: Sets the number of horizontal workspaces. Currently, cannot be changed at runtime.

option.name: vheight
option._long: Sets the number of vertical workspaces. Currently, cannot be changed at runtime.

option.name: background_color
option._long: Sets the background color of workspaces. Visible when nothing is drawing the background.

option.name: preferred_decoration_mode
option._long: Sets the preferred window decoration mode. Possible values are `client` and `server`. `client` allows the client to draw its own decorations.

option.name: xwayland
option._long: Enables or disables XWayland support, which allows X11 applications to be used.

option.name: max_render_time
option._long: Sets the compositor render delay in milliseconds, which allows applications to render with low latency.

option.name: focus_button_with_modifiers
option._short: Focus on click if keyboard modifiers are pressed
option._long: Allow focusing the clicked view even if keyboard modifiers are pressed. Without this option, click-to-focus only works if no modifiers are pressed.

option.name: focus_buttons
option._long: Clicking on a view with any of the mouse buttons of these will focus it.

option.name: focus_buttons_passthrough
option._long: Whether to pass buttons through to the client when switching the focus via clicking

option.name: only_decorate_gtk
option._long: When enabled, only requests client-side decoration for GTK applications.
